TextBlock.Text: OENO: Welcome to <color=orange>Tidal Grove</color>! If you are visiting here for the first time, be aware of the tide: it rises and falls on a regular cycle, but still manages to catch me off guard!
OENO: If you wish to read notes from other Nomai about this planet, we are currently keeping some scrolls in <color=orange>Brittle Hollow's Gravity Cannon</color> residence's lowest floor.
AVENS: Please note that the <color=orange>South Pole</color> houses the breeding grounds for the local fish, so try to keep your distance so as to not disturb them.

OENO: We have an observation area nearby, however, so feel free to go there. It's near enough to the <color=orange>South Pole</color> for any interested Nomai to observe the fish without being too disruptive.
